typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		AddressID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalCustomerID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TransformCscCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerSK as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		RecordStartDate as date,
		RecordEndDate as date,
		ActiveFlag as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DWCustomer
TransformCscCustomer, DWCustomer join(GlobalCustomerID == DWCustomer@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 split(isNull(DWCustomer@CustomerID),
	toDate(UpdatedDate)> RecordStartDate,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Insert, Update, Nochange)
ConditionalSplit1@Insert derive(ActiveFlag = 1) ~> dc
ConditionalSplit1@Update alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Update derive(ActiveFlag = 1,
		RecordStartDate = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 derive(RecordEndDate = currentDate(),
		ActiveFlag = 0) ~> DerivedColumn2
dc sink(input(
		CustomerSK as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		RecordStartDate as date,
		RecordEndDate as date,
		ActiveFlag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = GlobalCustomerID,
		LastName = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@LastName,
		FirstName = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@FirstName,
		AddressLine1 = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2 = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@AddressLine2,
		City = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@City,
		State = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@State,
		ZipCode = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@PhoneNumber,
		RecordStartDate,
		RecordEndDate,
		ActiveFlag
	)) ~> TargetDWCustomer
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		CustomerSK as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		RecordStartDate as date,
		RecordEndDate as date,
		ActiveFlag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = GlobalCustomerID,
		LastName = ConditionalSplit1@Update@LastName,
		FirstName = ConditionalSplit1@Update@FirstName,
		AddressLine1 = ConditionalSplit1@Update@AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2 = ConditionalSplit1@Update@AddressLine2,
		City = ConditionalSplit1@Update@City,
		State = ConditionalSplit1@Update@State,
		ZipCode = ConditionalSplit1@Update@ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber = ConditionalSplit1@Update@PhoneNumber,
		RecordStartDate = DerivedColumn1@RecordStartDate,
		RecordEndDate,
		ActiveFlag
	)) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(input(
		CustomerSK as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		RecordStartDate as date,
		RecordEndDate as date,
		ActiveFlag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['GlobalCustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		RecordEndDate,
		ActiveFlag = DerivedColumn2@ActiveFlag
	)) ~> sink2
